assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: The course will acquaint students with the development of artistic illustration and with the creative output of different artists. The course includes diverse illustration exercises.
description.et: Tutvumine kunstilise illustratsiooni arengu ning erinevate autorite loominguga. Eriilmelised illustreerimisharjutused.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to acquaint students with the means and possibilities of expression concerning illustration.

learning_outcomes.en: After passing the course, the students will have a better understanding of the different means and possibilities of expression concerning illustration and will be able to make use of it while teaching others. They will also be able to convincingly express their ideas through artistic illustration.
learning_outcomes.et: Kursuse läbinu on kursis erinevate kunstilise illustratsiooni väljendusvahendite ja -võimalustega ning oskab neid õpetamisel rakendada. Suudab oma ideid kunstilises illustratsioonis veenvalt väljendada.
